script:
;;静かな朝だね,中
;;神妙な朝だね,小
;;素敵な朝だね,大
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background %(background)s
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
@
マスターは
梓弓を誘って
渓流にやってきた

# textflame 1 1
@梓弓
この涼やかな水の音…

@梓弓
濃ゆい緑の気配…
;;----------------------------------------

# voice 4006 "azusa_0004"
# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
# textflame 1 1
@%(unitName:unit_a)s
頭の芯まで…
しんと響くようです…

# select "静かな朝だね" "select_label_01" "神妙な朝だね" "select_label_02" "素敵な朝だね" "select_label_03"
頭の芯まで…
しんと響くようです…

# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"

# label "select_label_end"
